blog.name: scanbeau
blog.title: I’m Not Bleeding Tonight
blog.description: The #1 Beauyasha stan. Nb lesbian, they/them. I write stuff sometimes. This blog is actually just documenting me going further and further into D&D hell.

question: x and y
answer:
X: A character you enjoy making suffer.

Okay Imma be real with you. I love making Beau suffer. It’s fucking delightful. I love making Yasha suffer too, but Beau is next level.

I’ve also recently gotten very into making Jonathan Sims suffer

Y: A character you want to protect.

Protecc Jester At All Costs. She deserves good things. Most of the camp1 characters are in this, too, because they have suffered ENOUGH, but especially pike, keyleth, and vex.

title: Blue cloth S2E60?
body:
Not sure if anyone else has done this yet, but curious about the scrap of blue cloth Beau found I’ve been scouring past videos to find out who have worn blue. I’ll discount Nila as she’s not a likely suspect.

1. Cobalt Soul are of course the prime suspects with their uniform of blue and grey. (First seen Ep.4)

2. Martinet Ludinus De’leth, Archmage of Domestic Protection for the Cerberus Assembly wore dark blue robe when spotted in Felderwin (Ep.48) 

3. From left field the Zolezzo guards on the Menagerie Coast wore blue and green (Ep.33)

4. The envoy from Marquet wore dark blue pants. (Ep.18)

Alternately it could be a frame job of course…

Please let me know if you’ve spotted any more!

-Albert Camus, “The Myth of Sisyphus”

blog.description: "Maybe, but you're warm." Ayy I'm Alx,(Aka Rogue) Him/Her. I'm a Writer, a Gamer, A Hopeless Romantic, and a heavy D&D enthusiast. Some could say I talk about it way too much, but that's okay. Games I like: Persona 4, Persona 5, Resident Evil, Silent Hill,Layers Of Fear, The Last Of Us,Firewatch, Final Fantasy, Kingdom Hearts, The Legend Of Zelda and Mass Effect, to name a few. Tv shows I like: Stranger Things,Killing Eve,GoT, The-X-Files,F.R.I.E.N.D.S, IASIP and B99, but there's A LOT! more. Movies I like: The Dark Crystal, Lord of the rings,The Hobbit an many more. I'm also a Musician, D&D player, Comic reader, Cat lover and a Landscape Artist. (I am matching with Aerlinniell, my lovely Fiancé whom I love and adore with all my heart, and also with my dear friend Eltharii. These two are nerds and I have no idea what I'd do without them.)INFP:3 Triforce of courage. Header by MLeeLunsford:3

blog.name: twinvax
blog.description: I write and reblog things for my fandoms. Main focus Critical Role. Feel free to send me asks or general headcanons about characters! I have a critical role rp blog! made and role played for Yeza the halfling (chemistyeza.tumblr.com). Asks open!

summary: “She’s hiding behind the sofa.” Jester, Nott
question: “She’s hiding behind the sofa.” Jester, Nott
answer:
Nott knows there is a cat in the house, she can hear it. She just can’t find it. She looks everywhere, turning things over that look like good hiding spots for an animal to cower in, but never sees what she’s looking for.

Jester, sitting on their couch watching TV as she doesn’t help Nott in any way with the search, smiling mischievously at her girlfriend because she thinks this is funny, stays silent while Nott looks everywhere around her. Doesn’t even move to help find the kitten that she brought home in the first place! 

Nott seethes for only a little while, before she calms because no one can be mad at Jester for long. The cat isn’t doing anything bad to the house anyway, so there’s no actual problem that Nott has besides not wanting the creature to be hiding where she can’t see it. 

It takes more than three hours, before Nott finally gives up and admits defeat, unable to find the cat like she had been bet by Jester to do. So now Jester won the bet, and she’s allowed to keep the cat as a pet, instead of bring it to a shelter, as their agreement stated. 

Nott stands in front of the woman lounging on the couch, looking pleased with herself, as Nott folds her arms across her chest, “Alright, you win. Where’s she hiding?” 

Jester laughs, leaning over to kiss her cheek, before returning to lounging happily as she watches the current show, “She’s hiding behind the sofa.” she said. 

With those words, the little gray kitten jumps up onto the back of the couch, looking Nott over with it’s adorable little cat eyes, and trips off the side down into Jester’s stomach, where she traps the little kitty in a gentle hug. 

Nott sighs, but doesn’t try to argue to get rid of it. She won it fair and square, but she hopes Jester will actually take care of it now. 

She’d hate for Jester to be sad because something happened, so she hopes this ends up being a good decision.
